original_text: As he taught, Jesus said, “Watch out for the teachers of the law. They like to walk around in flowing robes and be greeted with respect in the marketplaces,
korean_text: 예수께서 가르치실 때에 이르시되 긴 옷을 입고 다니는 것과 시장에서 문안 받는 것과

sentences.original_text: Watch out for the teachers of the law
They like to walk around in flowing robes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 긴 옷을 입고 다니는 것을 좋아하며

sentences.original_text: and be greeted with respect in the marketplaces
sentences.korean_translation: 시장에서 존경받는 인사를 받는 것을 좋아한다
